quoteText: YOU AGREE TO THE ARBITRATION AGREEMENT AND CLASS ACTION WAIVER DESCRIBED IN SECTION 7 TO RESOLVE ANY DISPUTES WITH NETFLIX (EXCEPT FOR MATTERS THAT MAY BE TAKEN TO SMALL CLAIMS COURT).
title: Lawsuit and class action waiver. Arbitration agreement. Survives termination of ToU agreement.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.
